title: Ticket #2671: Diagnose IPv6
description:
IPv6 doesn't appear to be working. Tellingly, Sinful strings in classads look like 
<1234:5678:1234:5678:1234:1234:1234:1234:555>
when they should look like 
<[1234:5678:1234:5678:1234:1234:1234:1234]:555>
Likely that in some merge old code that rolls its own sinful strings was reintroduced.
remarks:
2012-Jul-16 11:24:04 by adesmet:
Fixed a long time ago.
creator: adesmet
